ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Such people are following guidance from their Lord. They are the ones who are successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are on guidance from their Lord, and will prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is they who are on true guidance from their Lord, and it is they who shall prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They follow the guidance of their Lord and they will have everlasting happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is they who are on guidance from their Lord, and only they are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Such are on guidance from their Lord, and such are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are on a guidance from their Lord, and these are they who are successful:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those are upon guidance from their Lord; those are the prosperers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Such have guidance from their Lord. Such are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: these are rightly guided by their Lord: and these are the ones who will prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are on guidance from their Lord, and these! they are the blissful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those follow their Lord’s guidance, and it is they who are the felicitous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: These are on (true) guidance from their Lord: and these are the ones who will prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Such are on guidance from their Lord, and such are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those are guided by their Lord and will surely prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These are upon guidance from their Lord. These are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are on [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [31:5] Such follow guidance from their Lord and it is they who are the successful, the winners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Such have guidance) have a clear sight and honour (from their Lord. Such are the successful) they are saved from Allah's wrath and chastisement.
